message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start to the game!
You're being too generous, let's take a bit more!
You wanted more, now it's your turn to give a bit more!
You're still being too generous, I'm not budging!
You're not budging, I'll take a bit more. Don't expect me to give in forever!
You're getting desperate, I'm not going to let you get away with it!
You're pushing your luck, Bob. I'm not going to let you walk all over me!
You're getting close to desperation, I'm not backing down!
You're not getting the last laugh, Bob. I'm taking control!
You're trying to squeeze me dry, but I'm not going down without a fight!
This is my last offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
This is my final stand, take it or leave it! I'll get the lion's share!
